column4: ï»¿Guys, im having some probs with cairo dock. for some reason it wont start up for me, ive installed both deb packages and its in my app window but when i try to launch it. nothing ive read several guides and honstly i dont know whats wrong , ive reinstalled it several times aswell. any ideas?P
does it run with gksudo (just to test)
just type gksudo before the application you normally run
you can also autocomplete names in irc ;)
I put your name at the start so you know im addressing you
right click the item -> properties
try tab completing the command
type half a command and press tab
no, that only gives you the command you need to run from command line to run the same app
ok, the menu thing you have essentially gives you a pretty thing to click to run your apps
you can do exactly the same thing from command line, you can do everything at cli that you can do in gui
if you want to launch an app with admin privs you'll need gksudo
so you find out the program to run then type it out but put gksudo at the start
ok any output?
you need that library
try sudo apt-get install libglitz
try tab completing it :D
I might have some gold for you
seems you arent alone: http://fixunix.com/ubuntu/512311-anyone-get-cairo-dock-work-hardy.html
but.
http://ubuntuforums.org/showpost.php?p=4660832&postcount=7
